message.content: {"given_definition_quality":30,"better_definition":"indicates a completed action","sentence":"我吃了。","image_prompt":"A boy sits at a simple wooden table, holding an empty bowl and smiling with satisfaction, in a softly lit, post-apocalyptic animation style. The room is sparse but cozy, with cracked but clean walls, gentle daylight streaming in, evoking a sense of quiet completion and contentment. The boy looks relaxed, as if just finishing a meal was an achievement.","sentence_translation":"I have eaten."}
